      • getReviewsByMatrix

        public List<Review> getReviewsByMatrix(String matrixId)
        Description copied from interface: ReviewManager
        Retrieve all reviews for all cells in a user's matrix. This does not push the content to the security advisor since its purpose is bulk list efficiency.
        Specified by:
        getReviewsByMatrix in interface ReviewManager
        Parameters:
        matrixId - - the ID of the user's matrix
        Returns:
        List of Review of all types

      • getReviewsByMatrixAndType

        public List<Review> getReviewsByMatrixAndType(String matrixId,
                                     int type)
        Description copied from interface: ReviewManager
        Retrieve all reviews of a given type for all cells in a user's matrix. This does not push the content to the security advisor since its purpose is bulk list efficiency.
        Specified by:
        getReviewsByMatrixAndType in interface ReviewManager
        Parameters:
        matrixId - the ID of the user's matrix
        type - the desired type of review
        Returns:
        List of Review of all types

      • getNode

        protected Node getNode(Id artifactId)
        pushes the artifact into the security advisor. It then gets the resource, properties, and owner and places these into a Node.
        Parameters:
        artifactId - Id
        Returns:
        Node
        Throws:
        RuntimeException - on PermissionException, IdUnusedException, and TypeException
